title: Make Sharp, Clean Graphics Through the AI Logo Generator Suite
description: Modern branding is fueled by the expression of clean graphics since viewers connect with clarity...The post Make Sharp, Clean Graphics Through the AI Logo Generator Suite appeared first on Newsroom Panama.

title: Most peer reviewers now use AI, and publishing policy must keep pace
description: A new whitepaper from Frontiers shows that AI has rapidly become part of everyday peer review, with 53% of reviewers now using AI tools. The findings in "Unlocking AI's untapped potential: responsible innovation in research and publishing " point to a pivotal moment for research publishing. Adoption is accelerating and the opportunity now is to translate this momentum into stronger, more transparent, and more equitable research practices as demonstrated in Frontiers' policy outlines.

title: Nvidia buys AI software provider SchedMD to expand open-source AI push
description: The chip designer has earlier unveiled a new family of 'faster, cheaper and smarter' open-source AI models.

title: Amazon shareholder resolution targets AI work with Israel, DHS
description: Amazon.com Inc.’s business ties with Israel’s military and the US Department of Homeland Security are the focus of a shareholder proposal demanding that the company investigate whether such contracts comply with its responsible AI policies.
